thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Leslie

author: Leslie
title: Leslie
text: Love, love, love Thrift Books! Very seldom do they not have exactly the book I'm looking for! Great selection! Love the prices! Got a wrong book once, not even an issue. Keep it, we will get the correct book right out to you. Bam. Done! The only thing that could make it better is if you could anticipate the book I want and have it on my doorstep the same day! Kidding! But seriously, that would be awesome!
